note:
I enjoy maths, juggling, coding, sleeping and thinking, in no particular order.

Expect from me some video game screenshots, some astrophysics, some shaders, some forlorn words, some new ones too, and random curiosities found on the seashore of the internet.

fields.name: Pannoun
fields.value: I answer to all the pronouns, just use for me what you feel comfortable with.
